animeTitle: Date A Bullet: Dead or Bullet
animeDescription: Soon after falling into another world, Kurumi Tokisaki takes interest in a particular white cat. Much to Kurumi's disappointment, the two part ways.  Kurumi later meets Hibiki Higoromo, a white haired quasi-spirit. Hibiki explains that they are at the center of a killing game between quasi-spirits. Within the Neighboring World, the spirits compete for a single wish to be granted to the lone survivor of the death-match.  Understanding the rules of the game, Kurumi and Hibiki reach a compromiseâ€”a temporary alliance.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]
